channel.title: Nexus Church Podcasts
channel.itunes:subtitle: A selection of messages from Nexus Church, Brisbane Australia.
channel.itunes:author: Nexus Church Australia
channel.itunes:summary: A selection of messages from Nexus Church in Brisbane, Australia. For more information, check out http://mynexus.com.au.
channel.description: A selection of messages from Nexus Church in Brisbane, Australia. For more information, check out http://mynexus.com.au.

item.title: You Are The Light
item.itunes:author: Ps Cam Hall
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Ps Cam Hall)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 6:00 PM | Ps Cam Hall - You Are The Light
item.itunes:summary: Sun 6:00 PM | Jesus is the Light of the World, but He has called us to shine His light into the darkness on His behalf. Ps. Cam opens up Philippians and teaches us how we can be Christ's light to the world.
item.description: Sun 6:00 PM | Jesus is the Light of the World, but He has called us to shine His light into the darkness on His behalf. Ps. Cam opens up Philippians and teaches us how we can be Christ's light to the world.

item.title: The Christmas Mess
item.itunes:author: Ps Glen Cochrane
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Ps Glen Cochrane)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 8:30 AM | Ps Glen Cochrane - The Christmas Mess
item.itunes:summary: Sun 8:30 AM | Christmas wasn't the cute, little scene that we often see in the Nativity depictions at Christmas, but it was a moment where Heaven aggressively invaded Earth to wage war on sin.
item.description: Sun 8:30 AM | Christmas wasn't the cute, little scene that we often see in the Nativity depictions at Christmas, but it was a moment where Heaven aggressively invaded Earth to wage war on sin.

item.title: Jesus, The Light of the World
item.itunes:author: Ps Andrew Scott
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Ps Andrew Scott)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 6:00 PM | Ps Andrew Scott - Jesus, The Light of the World
item.itunes:summary: Sun 6:00 PM | Ps. Andrew that Jesus is light and He is life and has come with truth and grace.
item.description: Sun 6:00 PM | Ps. Andrew that Jesus is light and He is life and has come with truth and grace.

item.title: The Paradox of Joy to the World
item.itunes:author: Ps John Lewis
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Ps John Lewis)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 10:15 AM | Ps John Lewis - The Paradox of Joy to the World
item.itunes:summary: Sun 10:15 AM | How can we say 'Joy to the world' when there are so many things in this world that can rob our joy? Ps. John teaches on the Biblical truth of true, Godly joy.
item.description: Sun 10:15 AM | How can we say 'Joy to the world' when there are so many things in this world that can rob our joy? Ps. John teaches on the Biblical truth of true, Godly joy.

item.title: All I Want For Christmas___ Is Love
item.itunes:author: Ps Glen Cochrane
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Ps Glen Cochrane)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 6:00 PM | Ps Glen Cochrane - All I Want For Christmas.... Is Love
item.itunes:summary: Sun 6:00 PM | Ps. Glen reminds us of Christ's love for us, and the power of us following in Christ's example of love this Christmas.
item.description: Sun 6:00 PM | Ps. Glen reminds us of Christ's love for us, and the power of us following in Christ's example of love this Christmas.

item.title: The Balm of Gilead
item.itunes:author: Ps John Lewis
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Ps John Lewis)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 10:15 AM | Ps John Lewis - The Balm of Gilead
item.itunes:summary: Sun 10:15 AM | Ps. John teaches us the Jesus' blood, like the Balm of Gilead, brings healing and restoratin.
item.description: Sun 10:15 AM | Ps. John teaches us the Jesus' blood, like the Balm of Gilead, brings healing and restoratin.

item.title: People of Passion
item.itunes:author: Ps Glen Cochrane
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Ps Glen Cochrane)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 6:00 PM | Ps Glen Cochrane - People of Passion
item.itunes:summary: Sun 6:00 PM | Ps. Glen encourages us to live, not out of obligation, but out of our passionate love for Christ.
item.description: Sun 6:00 PM | Ps. Glen encourages us to live, not out of obligation, but out of our passionate love for Christ.

item.title: It Is I, Be Not Afraid - Part 2
item.itunes:author: Ps John Lewis
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Ps John Lewis)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 10:15 AM | Ps John Lewis - It Is I, Be Not Afraid - Part 2
item.itunes:summary: Sun 10:15 AM | Ps. John encourages us to look to Jesus in the storms of life.
item.description: Sun 10:15 AM | Ps. John encourages us to look to Jesus in the storms of life.

item.title: It Is I, Do Not Be Afraid
item.itunes:author: Ps John Lewis
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Ps John Lewis)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 8:30 AM | Ps John Lewis - It Is I, Do Not Be Afraid
item.itunes:summary: Sun 8:30 AM | Ps. John encourages us to look to Jesus in the storms of life.
item.description: Sun 8:30 AM | Ps. John encourages us to look to Jesus in the storms of life.

item.title: A Prosperous Soul Cultivates a Flourishing World
item.itunes:author: Sarah Starrenburg
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Sarah Starrenburg)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 6:00 PM | Sarah Starrenburg - A Prosperous Soul Cultivates a Flourishing World
item.itunes:summary: Sun 6:00 PM | The 'why' of a prosperous soul extends beyond ourselves, and out into the way we cultivate the flourishing of those around us.
item.description: Sun 6:00 PM | The 'why' of a prosperous soul extends beyond ourselves, and out into the way we cultivate the flourishing of those around us.

item.title: Pain and the Prosperous Soul
item.itunes:author: Ruth Limkin
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Ruth Limkin)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 6:00 PM | Ruth Limkin - Pain and the Prosperous Soul
item.itunes:summary: Sun 6:00 PM | Ps Ruth looks at our various responses to pain and how we can continue to cultivate a prosperous soul in the midst of difficulties and challenges.
item.description: Sun 6:00 PM | Ps Ruth looks at our various responses to pain and how we can continue to cultivate a prosperous soul in the midst of difficulties and challenges.

item.title: Understanding the Difference Between a Broken Heart and a Wounded Spirit
item.itunes:author: Joy Graetz
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Joy Graetz)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 8:30 AM | Joy Graetz - Understanding the Difference Between a Broken Heart and a Wounded Spirit
item.itunes:summary: Sun 8:30 AM | If the core of who we are is to prosper, it helps to understand the difference between a broken heart and a wounded spirit.
item.description: Sun 8:30 AM | If the core of who we are is to prosper, it helps to understand the difference between a broken heart and a wounded spirit.

item.title: Can We Be Friends?
item.itunes:author: Ps Andrew Scott
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Ps Andrew Scott)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 6:00 PM | Ps Andrew Scott - Can We Be Friends?
item.itunes:summary: Sun 6:00 PM | Few things will influence our lives and the state of our souls in the way friendships can. This practical message will inspire you to be intentional and prayerful about the key relationships in your life.
item.description: Sun 6:00 PM | Few things will influence our lives and the state of our souls in the way friendships can. This practical message will inspire you to be intentional and prayerful about the key relationships in your life.

item.title: The Fruits of a Prosperous Soul
item.itunes:author: Sarah Starrenburg
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Sarah Starrenburg)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 10:15 AM | Sarah Starrenburg - The Fruits of a Prosperous Soul
item.itunes:summary: Sun 10:15 AM | How do we know if our souls are prospering? This message looks at the fruits of the spirit as the indicators of the Holy Spirit working in us to create a prosperous soul.
item.description: Sun 10:15 AM | How do we know if our souls are prospering? This message looks at the fruits of the spirit as the indicators of the Holy Spirit working in us to create a prosperous soul.

item.title: Rid the Rear View
item.itunes:author: Ps Cam Hall
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Ps Cam Hall)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 6:00 PM | Ps Cam Hall - Rid the Rear View
item.itunes:summary: Sun 6:00 PM | Elisha's introduction to ministry is profound and from this story we can learn a couple of key things to obtain a prosperous soul.
item.description: Sun 6:00 PM | Elisha's introduction to ministry is profound and from this story we can learn a couple of key things to obtain a prosperous soul.

item.title: Think Like Jesus
item.itunes:author: Ps Andrew Scott
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Ps Andrew Scott)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 10:15 AM | Ps Andrew Scott - Think Like Jesus
item.itunes:summary: Sun 10:15 AM | Have you ever wondered what it is to think like Jesus? Ps. Andrew explores the unique and revolutionary way Jesus talked about thinking that goes far deeper than logic and information.
item.description: Sun 10:15 AM | Have you ever wondered what it is to think like Jesus? Ps. Andrew explores the unique and revolutionary way Jesus talked about thinking that goes far deeper than logic and information.

item.title: Rest and the Prosperous Soul
item.itunes:author: Ps Murray Averill
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Ps Murray Averill)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 10:15 AM | Ps Murray Averill - Rest and the Prosperous Soul
item.itunes:summary: Sun 10:15 AM | A prosperous soul is a fully engaged soul at rest because it is under God's authority. In this message Ps. Murray unpacks what a soul at rest looks like and how to find that place.
item.description: Sun 10:15 AM | A prosperous soul is a fully engaged soul at rest because it is under God's authority. In this message Ps. Murray unpacks what a soul at rest looks like and how to find that place.

item.title: Doors
item.itunes:author: Ps. Gary Morgan
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Ps. Gary Morgan)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 6:00 PM | Ps. Gary Morgan - Doors
item.itunes:summary: Sun 6:00 PM | Ps. Gary teaches us to understand the different doors that God opens and closes for us.
item.description: Sun 6:00 PM | Ps. Gary teaches us to understand the different doors that God opens and closes for us.

item.title: The Power of the Journey
item.itunes:author: Ps. Gary Morgan
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Ps. Gary Morgan)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 10:15 AM | Ps. Gary Morgan - The Power of the Journey
item.itunes:summary: Sun 10:15 AM | Ps. Gary reminds us that the work that God does in us on the journey is often more important than the destination.
item.description: Sun 10:15 AM | Ps. Gary reminds us that the work that God does in us on the journey is often more important than the destination.

item.title: Seek First His Kingdom
item.itunes:author: Ps. James Schleusener
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Ps. James Schleusener)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 6:00 PM | Ps. James Schleusener - Seek First His Kingdom
item.itunes:summary: Sun 6:00 PM | Ps. James unpacks John 18 to show us how God's Kingdom is unlike any other kingdom, reminding us that God's promises can be fully trusted.
item.description: Sun 6:00 PM | Ps. James unpacks John 18 to show us how God's Kingdom is unlike any other kingdom, reminding us that God's promises can be fully trusted.

item.title: Love, Belonging and Vulnerability
item.itunes:author: Ps Murray Averill
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Ps Murray Averill)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 10:15 AM | Ps Murray Averill - Love, Belonging and Vulnerability
item.itunes:summary: Sun 10:15 AM | Ps. Murray teaches us that a prosperous soul flows from a strong sense of love and belonging, and the vulnerability we practice.
item.description: Sun 10:15 AM | Ps. Murray teaches us that a prosperous soul flows from a strong sense of love and belonging, and the vulnerability we practice.

item.title: Cultivating and Maintaining A Prosperous Soul
item.itunes:author: Ps Cam Hall
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Ps Cam Hall)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 6:00 PM | Ps Cam Hall - Cultivating and Maintaining A Prosperous Soul
item.itunes:summary: Sun 6:00 PM | Enjoy listening to a panel made up of a Pyschologist, Social Worker, GP and CEO of a Health and Wellness Centre to discuss this wide, fascinating and dynamic topic of the human soul.
item.description: Sun 6:00 PM | Enjoy listening to a panel made up of a Pyschologist, Social Worker, GP and CEO of a Health and Wellness Centre to discuss this wide, fascinating and dynamic topic of the human soul.

item.title: Processing your Emotion with God
item.itunes:author: Ps Andrew Scott
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Ps Andrew Scott)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 8:15 AM | Ps Andrew Scott - Processing your Emotion with God
item.itunes:summary: Sun 8:15 AM | Ps Andrew encourages us that emotional engagement with God is one of our greatest opportunities for spiritual growth. We talk practically about how to process our emotion, so we can feel at home with God and embrace authentic living.
item.description: Sun 8:15 AM | Ps Andrew encourages us that emotional engagement with God is one of our greatest opportunities for spiritual growth. We talk practically about how to process our emotion, so we can feel at home with God and embrace authentic living.

item.title: Cultivating a Prosperous Soul
item.itunes:author: Ps. Josh Plumb
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Ps. Josh Plumb)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 6:00 PM | Ps. Josh Plumb - Cultivating a Prosperous Soul
item.itunes:summary: Sun 6:00 PM | Ps. Josh reminds us that changing our world begins with stewarding ourselves well first. That God has created us body, soul and spirit and what He has graced and gifted each of us to do is stronger when our inner world prospers. Josh's message encourages us with practical steps in God's Word to cultivate a prosperous soul.
item.description: Sun 6:00 PM | Ps. Josh reminds us that changing our world begins with stewarding ourselves well first. That God has created us body, soul and spirit and what He has graced and gifted each of us to do is stronger when our inner world prospers. Josh's message encourages us with practical steps in God's Word to cultivate a prosperous soul.

item.title: A Prosperous Soul - Part 1
item.itunes:author: Ruth Limkin
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Ruth Limkin)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 10:15 AM | Ruth Limkin - A Prosperous Soul - Part 1
item.itunes:summary: Sun 10:15 AM | Ps. Ruth reminds us that we are spirit AND soul AND body, and God's Word gives us great guidance on caring for all three. Ruth's message empowers us to acknowledge reality and teaches us how to respond with a practical solution.
item.description: Sun 10:15 AM | Ps. Ruth reminds us that we are spirit AND soul AND body, and God's Word gives us great guidance on caring for all three. Ruth's message empowers us to acknowledge reality and teaches us how to respond with a practical solution.

item.title: Into Your Future
item.itunes:author: Shane Willard
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Shane Willard)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 6:00 PM | Shane Willard - Into Your Future
item.itunes:summary: Sun 6:00 PM | Shane Willard encourages us to put off the things of our past that hold us back and to choose the future that God has in store for us.
item.description: Sun 6:00 PM | Shane Willard encourages us to put off the things of our past that hold us back and to choose the future that God has in store for us.

item.title: Breaking the Dam
item.itunes:author: Ps. John Scott
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Ps. John Scott)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 10:15 AM | Ps. John Scott - Breaking the Dam
item.itunes:summary: Sun 10:15 AM | Ps. John Scott shares how the Holy Spirit broke into his life like the breaking of a dam, filling his life with power and love.
item.description: Sun 10:15 AM | Ps. John Scott shares how the Holy Spirit broke into his life like the breaking of a dam, filling his life with power and love.

item.title: Confidence - Part 2
item.itunes:author: Ps Murray Averill
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Ps Murray Averill)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 8:30 AM | Ps Murray Averill - Confidence - Part 2
item.itunes:summary: Sun 8:30 AM | Confidence creates opportunities, confidence helps you take opportunities and confidence is contagious. Ps Murray shares Biblical keys for building confidence
item.description: Sun 8:30 AM | Confidence creates opportunities, confidence helps you take opportunities and confidence is contagious. Ps Murray shares Biblical keys for building confidence

item.title: The Second Choice
item.itunes:author: Ps. Melinda Dwight
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Ps. Melinda Dwight)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 8:30 AM | Ps. Melinda Dwight - The Second Choice
item.itunes:summary: Sun 8:30 AM | Ps. Melinda Dwight talks about being the 'second choice', and the opportunities that come when we simply make ourselves available to God's call.
item.description: Sun 8:30 AM | Ps. Melinda Dwight talks about being the 'second choice', and the opportunities that come when we simply make ourselves available to God's call.

item.title: Confidence - Part 1
item.itunes:author: Ps Murray Averill
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Ps Murray Averill)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 10:15 AM | Ps Murray Averill - Confidence - Part 1
item.itunes:summary: Sun 10:15 AM | Confidence creates opportunities, confidence helps you take opportunities and confidence is contagious. Ps Murray shares Biblical keys for building confidence
item.description: Sun 10:15 AM | Confidence creates opportunities, confidence helps you take opportunities and confidence is contagious. Ps Murray shares Biblical keys for building confidence

item.title: Jemima Varughese - My Story
item.itunes:author: Ps. Jemima Varughese
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Ps. Jemima Varughese)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 6:00 PM | Ps. Jemima Varughese - My Story
item.itunes:summary: Sun 6:00 PM | Ps. Jemima tells the story of her journey through brokenness and confusion into finding security and purpose in Christ.
item.description: Sun 6:00 PM | Ps. Jemima tells the story of her journey through brokenness and confusion into finding security and purpose in Christ.

item.title: Jemima Varughese - Stepping Out
item.itunes:author: Ps. Jemima Varughese
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Ps. Jemima Varughese)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 10:15 AM | Ps. Jemima Varughese - Stepping Out
item.itunes:summary: Sun 10:15 AM | Ps. Jemima reminds us of the impact that we can make by stepping out of our comfort zone if our eyes stay fixed on Jesus.
item.description: Sun 10:15 AM | Ps. Jemima reminds us of the impact that we can make by stepping out of our comfort zone if our eyes stay fixed on Jesus.

item.title: More Is Found on the End of an Invitation
item.itunes:author: Ps Cam Hall
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Ps Cam Hall)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 6:00 PM | Ps Cam Hall - More Is Found on the End of an Invitation
item.itunes:summary: Sun 6:00 PM | Throughout the gospels, Jesus always offered people the invitation to be invited into the more He had for them. This message looks at the Rich Young Ruler and why it was difficult for him to give up control and step into Jesus' invitation.
item.description: Sun 6:00 PM | Throughout the gospels, Jesus always offered people the invitation to be invited into the more He had for them. This message looks at the Rich Young Ruler and why it was difficult for him to give up control and step into Jesus' invitation.

item.title: The Apprentice
item.itunes:author: Ps Murray Averill
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Ps Murray Averill)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 10:15 AM | Ps Murray Averill - The Apprentice
item.itunes:summary: Sun 10:15 AM | Ps Murray preaches about some of the seasons that produce growth and the image of God in our lives.
item.description: Sun 10:15 AM | Ps Murray preaches about some of the seasons that produce growth and the image of God in our lives.

item.title: Jesus (Don't) Take The Wheel
item.itunes:author: Ps Murray Averill
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Ps Murray Averill)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 10:15 AM | Ps Murray Averill - Jesus (Don't) Take The Wheel
item.itunes:summary: Sun 10:15 AM | Jesus is not in the driver's seat in our lives. We are. Ps. Murray teaches us to live in the authority that we have been given, guided by God's Word and the prompting of the Holy Spirit.
item.description: Sun 10:15 AM | Jesus is not in the driver's seat in our lives. We are. Ps. Murray teaches us to live in the authority that we have been given, guided by God's Word and the prompting of the Holy Spirit.

item.title: More - In Christ
item.itunes:author: Marly & Ben Conley
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Marly & Ben Conley)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 6:00 PM | Marly & Ben Conley - More - In Christ
item.itunes:summary: Sun 6:00 PM | Every good gift has been made available to us in Christ. Identifying with your righteousness in Christ will transform the way that you live your life.
item.description: Sun 6:00 PM | Every good gift has been made available to us in Christ. Identifying with your righteousness in Christ will transform the way that you live your life.

item.title: Goal and Prize
item.itunes:author: Ps Murray Averill
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Ps Murray Averill)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 10:15 AM | Ps Murray Averill - Goal and Prize
item.itunes:summary: Sun 10:15 AM | The Apostle Paul encourages us to press on toward the goal to get the prize. Ps Murray looks at the goal and prize of the Christian life, how to attain it and how it can be missed.
item.description: Sun 10:15 AM | The Apostle Paul encourages us to press on toward the goal to get the prize. Ps Murray looks at the goal and prize of the Christian life, how to attain it and how it can be missed.

item.title: You Need More!
item.itunes:author: Ps Dan Harding
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Ps Dan Harding)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 6:00 PM | Ps Dan Harding - Three things everyone needs more of!
item.itunes:summary: Sun 6:00 PM | God has richly gifted and called everyone of faith to a life of purpose. However, some of us can end up in seasons where we begin to "settle" for less than what God has gifted and called us to. This week Ps. Dan Harding encourages us to never settle for less than God's purposes for your life.
item.description: Sun 6:00 PM | God has richly gifted and called everyone of faith to a life of purpose. However, some of us can end up in seasons where we begin to "settle" for less than what God has gifted and called us to. This week Ps. Dan Harding encourages us to never settle for less than God's purposes for your life.

item.title: Becoming You - Change
item.itunes:author: Ps Murray Averill
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Ps Murray Averill)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 10:15 AM | Ps Murray Averill - Becoming You - Change
item.itunes:summary: Sun 10:15 AM | What needs to change in order for us to become the people God has created us to be?
item.description: Sun 10:15 AM | What needs to change in order for us to become the people God has created us to be?

item.title: Becoming You - Sonship
item.itunes:author: Ps Murray Averill
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Ps Murray Averill)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 10:16 AM | Ps Murray Averill - Becoming You - Sonship
item.itunes:summary: Sun 10:16 AM | Ps Murray explores the different Greek words for son and relates those to our growth as disciples of Jesus.
item.description: Sun 10:16 AM | Ps Murray explores the different Greek words for son and relates those to our growth as disciples of Jesus.

item.title: Walk Trusting
item.itunes:author: Ps Cam Hall
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Ps Cam Hall)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 6:00 PM | Ps Cam Hall - Walk Trusting
item.itunes:summary: Sun 6:00 PM | Can we truly trust God? His intentions towards us? His timing? Personal testimony, as well as reflecting on what Jesus did on the Cross, will go a long way to answering these challenging questions.
item.description: Sun 6:00 PM | Can we truly trust God? His intentions towards us? His timing? Personal testimony, as well as reflecting on what Jesus did on the Cross, will go a long way to answering these challenging questions.

item.title: Walk In Purity_
item.itunes:author: Ps Dan Harding
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Ps Dan Harding)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 10:15 AM | Ps Dan Harding - Walk In Purity
item.itunes:summary: Sun 10:15 AM | Ps Dan investigates what the Bible says about purity and how we make sense of the sometimes opposing views on how we walk in it. Fundamentally, this message looks at the purity God declares over us through faith in Jesus as well as the choice we each have to demonstrate that purity in our day-to-day lives.
item.description: Sun 10:15 AM | Ps Dan investigates what the Bible says about purity and how we make sense of the sometimes opposing views on how we walk in it. Fundamentally, this message looks at the purity God declares over us through faith in Jesus as well as the choice we each have to demonstrate that purity in our day-to-day lives.

item.title: Seed
item.itunes:author: Ps Murray Averill
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Ps Murray Averill)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 8:30 AM | Ps Murray Averill - Seed
item.itunes:summary: Sun 8:30 AM | The key to financial blessing and kingdom advancement is to know when and where to sow seed and when to turn it into bread.
item.description: Sun 8:30 AM | The key to financial blessing and kingdom advancement is to know when and where to sow seed and when to turn it into bread.
item.itunes:keywords: The key to financial blessing and kingdom advancement is to know when and where to sow seed and when to turn it into bread.

item.title: Walking Prayerfully
item.itunes:author: Ps. Esther Harding
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Ps. Esther Harding)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 6:00 PM | Ps. Esther Harding - Walking Prayerfully
item.itunes:summary: Sun 6:00 PM | Praying to a person as Jesus taught in Luke 11:1-13, not merely going through a process, and growing our understanding of who God is will grow our prayer life. Knowing we are praying with Father, Son and Holy Spirit is key to effective prayer. 3 is the key!
item.description: Sun 6:00 PM | Praying to a person as Jesus taught in Luke 11:1-13, not merely going through a process, and growing our understanding of who God is will grow our prayer life. Knowing we are praying with Father, Son and Holy Spirit is key to effective prayer. 3 is the key!

item.title: Love and Money
item.itunes:author: Ps Murray Averill
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Ps Murray Averill)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 10:15 AM | Ps Murray Averill - Love and Money
item.itunes:summary: Sun 10:15 AM | Stewardship of our money is not meant to be merely transactional in nature but transformational.
item.description: Sun 10:15 AM | Stewardship of our money is not meant to be merely transactional in nature but transformational.
item.itunes:keywords: Stewardship of our money is not meant to be merely transactional in nature but transformational.

item.title: Thankful
item.itunes:author: Ps Andrew Scott
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Ps Andrew Scott)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 6:00 PM | Ps Andrew Scott - Thankful
item.itunes:summary: Sun 6:00 PM | Find out how two simple words, "thank you," can transform how you see God and others, and release fresh faith and freedom in your life.
item.description: Sun 6:00 PM | Find out how two simple words, "thank you," can transform how you see God and others, and release fresh faith and freedom in your life.
item.itunes:keywords: Find out how two simple words, "thank you," can transform how you see God and others, and release fresh faith and freedom in your life.

item.title: Walk Praying
item.itunes:author: Ps Murray Averill
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Ps Murray Averill)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 9:15 AM | Ps Murray Averill - Walk Praying
item.itunes:summary: Sun 9:15 AM | Prayer brings us into the courtroom of heaven. The more we understand the way the courtroom of heaven functions, the more strategic and effective our prayers will be.
item.description: Sun 9:15 AM | Prayer brings us into the courtroom of heaven. The more we understand the way the courtroom of heaven functions, the more strategic and effective our prayers will be.
item.itunes:keywords: Prayer brings us into the courtroom of heaven. The more we understand the way the courtroom of heaven functions, the more strategic and effective our prayers will be.

item.title: Walk in Purity
item.itunes:author: Ps Dan Harding
item.author: info@nexuschurch.com.au (Ps Dan Harding)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sun 6:00 PM | Ps Dan Harding - Walk in Purity
item.itunes:summary: Sun 6:00 PM | The Bible talks about purity in so many ways. Sometimes it sounds like God makes us pure, sometimes we read that we are called to be pure. Ps. Dan tries to make sense of how we can truly walk in purity with freedom and hope.
